column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////You can't visit Chicago and not get a deep dish. We got the classic with sausage
column4: and the world famous buttery crust. Now I don't usually like deep dish
column5: but I knew it'd be sacrilegious to get the thin crust
column6: and I'm glad I went with my got! The pizza was delicious
column8: and the buttery crust was heaven. They also have a waiting system that notifies you on your phone when it's time to be seated and you can order your pizza ahead of time to optimize pizza eating time. Next time I come I'll definitely have to try their chocolate chip pizza for dessert
